moves.effect: Inflicts twice the damage the user received from the last special hit it took.

ability.name: Sturdy
ability.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: Sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.effect: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Defense by one stage.

moves.name: Heavy Slam
moves.effect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.

ability.name: Thick Fat
ability.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: Thick Fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

moves.name: Flare Blitz
moves.effect: User takes 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.  Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

moves.name: Darkest Lariat
moves.effect: Ignores the target's stat modifiers.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.effect: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.effect: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

ability.name: Blaze
ability.effect: Strengthens fire moves to inflict 1.5× damage at 1/3 max HP or less.

held.name: Firium Z
held.effect: Held: Allows a Pokémon to use the Z-move equivalents of its Fire moves.
